ID: C1W79XA_02
From: Ozdinc, Yekta <Yekta.Ozdinc@marsh.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop,

 

Good to speak with you yesterday.

 

I am attaching a brief on Beazley’s incident response & prevention services and additional information such as list of incident response vendors as summarized as below. Post inception we would organize a call between Chalhoub Group and Beazley Security to actually present the content during an onboarding session. 

 

I also attached for your reference Marsh’s Cyber Claims Protocole which highlights the steps to be taken at the time of an incident or a claim. 

 

Any questions please let me know and I also attached NMCD for your easy reference and date of proposal form 04 November 2024.

 

BEAZLEY SERVICES PROPOSITION

I also attached for your reference Marsh’s Cyber Claims Protocole which highlights the steps to be taken at the time of an incident or a claim. 

 

Any questions please let me know and I also attached NMCD for your easy reference and date of proposal form 04 November 2024.

 

BEAZLEY SERVICES PROPOSITION

We have summarised the basics of the Cyber Services proposition on these pages: https://www.beazley.com/en-gb/products/cyber-tech-united-kingdom/bbr-cyber-breach-solution <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ENfZCO5ABU0Zp7ZUvhxcGCz7L?domain=urldefense.com>  

We also created a video that explains how the Cyber Services team would work in the event of an incident – the video is hosted on our public website so you and your colleagues do not need to register to view: https://www.beazley.com/en-001/BBRvideoUK <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/1pIjCQ5DEU3lk2lCksAcGCTbx?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

VENDOR PANELS

We regularly update international vendor panels online (should you wish to check who is on our panels): https://www.beazley.com/en-001/cyber-customer-centre/cyber-risk-management-tools/cyber-incident-response-services/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/f5KYCV0LMU5kxWkiku3cEf3dw?domain=urldefense.com> 

These vendors are only those that are formally on our panel for privacy legal and IT forensics services. We actually have a wider, informal network of service providers so if ever you want a recommendation for a particular service please do get in touch so we can help.

 

Service

Provider

Benefit

Important for clients

Legal Services

Bird & Bird

These vendors are only those that are formally on our panel for privacy legal and IT forensics services. We actually have a wider, informal network of service providers so if ever you want a recommendation for a particular service please do get in touch so we can help.

 

Service

Provider

Benefit

Important for clients

Legal Services

Bird & Bird

DAC Beachcroft

Kennedys

Coordination of global or regional privacy and cyber projects from their regional offices and partner firm networks. 

Beazley preferential rates agreed. 

If a breach occurs that may require notification under relevant breach notice laws or regulations, legal services are included with your policy to assist in the investigation and response. 

A cyber incident may result in legal and regulatory consequences for your organisation. Personal data breaches may require notification to regulators or to individuals under relevant privacy laws or regulations.

Depending on your industry, you may have additional regulatory notification requirements. Our legal vendors can assist you to assess the nature and scope of the incident, and advise on your legal and regulatory obligations in the relevant territories.

Digital Forensics and Incident Response 

(DFIR)

Ankura

Crowdstrike

KPMG

Kroll

Expert assistance provided from reputable providers to investigate an incident. 

Beazley preferential rates agreed.

Digital Forensics and Incident Response 

(DFIR)

Ankura

Crowdstrike

KPMG

Kroll

Expert assistance provided from reputable providers to investigate an incident. 

Beazley preferential rates agreed.

External assistance is often needed to assess the impact of a breach on your computer system, forensic services will be provided to help to determine the existence, cause and scope of the breach, and the extent to which notification must be provided to comply with Breach Notice Laws.

Ransomware Negotiations

Coveware

Reputable provider to engage with threat actor in event of a ransom demand being made. 

Beazley preferred rates to apply

In the event of an extortion attempt, Beazley’s partner vendor is experienced in combining ransomware case data and specialised negotiating techniques to achieve superior ransomware incident response and recovery results regardless of whether you decide to pay the ransom. 

Notifications and call centres

Epiq

Experian

Kroll

Global notification hub with regional hotline (UAE)

Local language support.

Beazley preferred rates to apply

Following an actual or suspected breach, you may need to manage enquiries from concerned customers, suppliers and stakeholders. Our specialist expert vendors give you advice on ensuring quality communication are available. 

Public Relations/ Crisis management 

Kekst CNC

Publicis Network 

Local expertise with global support. 

Beazley preferred rates to apply

Following an actual or suspected breach, you may need to manage enquiries from concerned customers, suppliers and stakeholders. Our specialist expert vendors give you advice on ensuring quality communication are available. 

Public Relations/ Crisis management 

Kekst CNC

Publicis Network 

Local expertise with global support. 

Beazley preferred rates to apply

Managing the company's reputation during and after a cyber incident is vital, especially with the impact of social media. Direct, expert guidance is available on how to respond to adverse or unfavourable publicity to mitigate damage to the brand reputation and customer and supplier relationships. 

 

INCIDENT NOTIFICATION

We list of all our notification methods online here: https://cyberservices.beazley.com/international/activation_of_breach_response_services_international_(en)/notifications.html <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/K-gdCXkNOSqDX8DfMF1cWoXkE?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

BEAZLEY CYBER CUSTOMER CENTRE

All cyber policyholders’ access to the customer centre: https://www.beazleybreachsolutions.com/uk/registration.html <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/5puACZmPQtD85k8iJI4cBjIGc?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

CYGNVS I.R. PREP PORTAL

As a Beazley policyholder, you are eligible to a free “prep room” in the CYGNVS platform: https://cygnvs.net/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ESOoC21LBTRZpBZS8Tnc5jl2N?domain=urldefense.com>

As a Beazley policyholder, you are eligible to a free “prep room” in the CYGNVS platform: https://cygnvs.net/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ESOoC21LBTRZpBZS8Tnc5jl2N?domain=urldefense.com>  

The platform is mobile, out-of-band, secure and pre-configured with built-in playbooks, industry templates and workstream assignments. It can guide you through your tailored response plan assigning role-specific tasks to team members.

If you would like to request an onboarding call with Cygnvs please use the following URL mentioning that you are a Beazley policyholder: https://meet.cygnvs.com/meetings/cygnvsdemo/beazley-referrals <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/q8CTC4YN0Fm9BD9CLcyc4-jwK?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

RISK MANAGEMENT SERVICES

As a Beazley policyholder you are entitled to a number of discounts and/or preferential rates for vendor services from leading cyber-risk partners including Mandiant/FireEye, KnowBe4 and KYND: https://www.beazley.com/en-GB/cyber-customer-centre/cyber-risk-management-tools/cyber-prevention-services/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/5bgiC6zPJS10rp0tEh6c5VGjc?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

You may also be eligible for other risk management offerings depending on the level of your premium: https://www.beazley.com/en-GB/cyber-customer-centre/cyber-risk-management-tools/risk-management-offerings/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mkXLC8BRLCzP62PFZsxcyB_P-?domain=urldefense.com>

You may also be eligible for other risk management offerings depending on the level of your premium: https://www.beazley.com/en-GB/cyber-customer-centre/cyber-risk-management-tools/risk-management-offerings/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mkXLC8BRLCzP62PFZsxcyB_P-?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

We frequently publish useful information, reports, invitations to webinars and other collateral on our website and one resource I would like to point you to is our quarterly ‘Cyber Services Snapshot’: https://www.beazley.com/en-us/cyber-services-snapshot <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/R_QDC0XJzfMgG7gt4u2c9x_YI?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

Beazley Security has extensive capabilities outside the insurance and further information can be found here: Beazley Security Capabilities Brochure <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/XekKCgQl4SmwAowC1C4c4wr3R?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

Additional information and latest cyber insights can also be found on the website Home <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/j0_2CjOo4F3GnBGCZFocmSi34?domain=urldefense.com>  

 

Kind regards,

 

Yekta Ozdinc, Cert CII

VP, Cyber Broker, Cyber Practice, MENA

M +971 50 536 0452

 

Gate Village 7, Level 3, DIFC, Dubai, United Arab Emirates 

www.marsh.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/CE1-ClMq4TAP2VPH7I6czJDJC?domain=marsh.com/> 

 



 

A business of Marsh McLennan

 

Marsh Management Services (MENA) Limited
